## Basic usage

This is an R interface of [tumopp](https://github.com/heavywatal/tumopp),
a tumor growth simulator in C++.
Results are stored in a nested data.frame.

```{r run}
library(tumopp)
results = tumopp("-D3 -Cmoore -k10 -N1000")
```

## Explore parameter space

See `tumopp -h` or
[C++ library documentation generated by doxygen](https://heavywatal.github.io/tumopp/group__params.html)
for available parameters.

```{r dontrun, eval=FALSE}
.const = c('-D3', '-Chex', '-N1000')
.alt = list(
  # D = c('2', '3'),
  # C = c('hex', 'moore', 'neumann'),
  k = c('1', '1e6'),
  L = c('const', 'linear', 'step'),
  P = c('random', 'mindrag', 'roulette'),
  d = c('0.0', '0.2'),
  m = c('0.0', '2.0')
)

argslist = make_args(alt = .alt, const = .const, nreps = 2L)
results = tumopp(argslist)
```
